catalog-entities 1.0.14 API

Bibliographic entity processing for Java

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
org.xbib.catalog.entities
Classes for catalog entitiies.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.mab
Classes for processing MAB-TITEL catalog fields.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.marc.bib
Classes for defining MARC semantic sentities.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.marc.hol
Classes for defining MARC holdings semantic entities.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.marc.nlz
Classes for defining "Nationallizenzen" semantic entities in MARC.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.marc.zdb.bib
Classes for ZDB interpretation of MARC semantics.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.marc.zdb.hol
Classes for ZDB interpretation of MARC holdings semantics.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.matching
Classes for matching bibliographic entities.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.matching.abbreviations
Classes for handling bibliographic abbreviations.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.matching.date
Classing for matching bibliographic dates.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.matching.digits
Classes for matching bibliographic digit sequences.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.matching.endeavor
Classes for matching bibliographic endeavors.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.matching.name
Classes for matching bibliographic names.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.matching.string
Classes for mathing bibliograohic strings.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.matching.structure
Classes for matching bibliographic structures.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.matching.title
Classes for matching bibliographic titles.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.pica.natliz.bib
Classes for "Nationallizenzen" defined as PICA semantic entities.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.pica.zdb.bibdat
Classes for defining bibliographic addresses in PICA semantic entities.
org.xbib.catalog.entities.unimarc.bib
Classes for defining UNIMARC semantic entitites.
